body.from:
- Project Status: 
  - [ ] :recycle: All good
  - [x] :warning: Behind schedule
  - [ ] :x: Blocked and needs attention
  - [ ] :ship: Shipped
  - [ ] :pause_button: Paused, haven't started

- Projected Ship Date: TBD (spec-ing, ramping up, 5/23 hard deadline)
- Next Major Deliverable
  - Description: product specs, design specs
  - Delivery Date: 3/1
- What Happened This Week
  - Break out separate issues for FGP (linked from description)
    - [As an OSS public repository maintainer, I want to control who can triage issues](https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/901)
    - [As an org admin, I want to control who can create and delete Repos/teams/org. projects](https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/903)
    - [As a repo admin, I want to control who can publish and update Releases](https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/902)
    - Break out Authzd enhancements list, decide to use authzd, provide grant API for camps team
  - Design mockups for selecting FGP
  - Wrap up specification for triage role so it's ready for dev
  - Role templates were determined to be out of scope for May 23, stretch goal https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/908
- What We're Planning Next Week
  - Limit team creation to org admins https://github.com/github/github/pull/108901 (draft PR, pairing with backend)
  - Merge authzd schema changes to unblock UX changes, and granters https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/930
  - Write granters https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/933 https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/939
  - Audit call sites https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/934, https://github.com/github/pe-iam/issues/935

issue.title: Weekly digest
issue.body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*dmleong/hello-world-actions*](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 5 issues were created.
Of these, 2 issues have been closed and 3 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #5 [A new test issue](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/issues/5), by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
:green_heart: #4 [Test](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/issues/4), by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
:green_heart: #3 [Congratulations](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/issues/3), by [github-learning-lab[bot]](https://github.com/apps/github-learning-lab)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #2 [Add Dockerfile](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/pull/2), by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
:heart: #1 [Welcome](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/issues/1), by [github-learning-lab[bot]](https://github.com/apps/github-learning-lab)
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #5 [A new test issue](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/issues/5), by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
It received 32 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 1 pull request was created, updated or merged.
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 1 pull request was merged.
:purple_heart: #2 [Add Dockerfile](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/pull/2), by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 5 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Merge pull request #2 from dmleong/setup-actions  Add Dockerfile](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/commit/ba0b414d3bade47af14fcdbffe62fc13584a17fe) by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Define action](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/commit/b9049dbb7e5f72d4402661d2cd686d79646ec537) by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add workflow file](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/commit/53dd5b47956ebd09456b4e069c0532f141f6ad81) by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add entrypoint.sh](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/commit/704fd83c831d9ac709a033193752f38fd2f0d8df) by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add Dockerfile](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/commit/f305248e7a79aba53b5a9b991544283bfc3cbb75) by [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)

 - - - 
# CONTRIBUTORS
Last week there was 1 contributor.
:bust_in_silhouette: [dmleong](https://github.com/dmleong)

 - - - 
# STARGAZERS
Last week there were no stargazers.

 - - - 
# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*dmleong/hello-world-actions*](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:

*You can also [view all Weekly Digests by clicking here](https://github.com/dmleong/hello-world-actions/issues?q=is:open+is:issue+label:weekly-digest).* 

> Your [**Weekly Digest**](https://github.com/apps/weekly-digest) bot. :calendar:
